ðŸ“– Summary: X-Gif-Maker is a C++ tool for quickly converting videos into GIFs, optimized for sharing on platforms like X (Twitter). It provides a user-friendly interface with options to adjust GIF quality and width, utilizes multithreading for performance, and includes shortcut keys for efficient operation.
